name: High and Rising
description:
"The Water Levels Are Rising" 

GameJam192 Ep2 Entry

A fun and fast paced competitive race to the top

Challange your friends and family by getting the quickest time to reach the top of a daring climb! But watch out for that high and rising tide!... 

Unlock up to 6 different levels! 

Play in solo or 2 player splitscreen! 

Fancy a challenge? Up the difficulty to medium or hard to have the water rise quicker! 

Controls P1:  WAD
Controls P2:  ← ↑→

Developed by Sam Orme & Lucas Ord

3rd Party Assets :
